modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod adds lighter (less dense) Particle effects to biomes for those who have FPS issues with the Core effects.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod adds lighter (less dense) Particle effects to biomes for those who have FPS issues with the Core effects.

**Requires Mod:** [Punishing Weather â€“ Core](https://7daystodiemods.com/punishing-weather-core/)

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/doughphunghus/7D2D-Doughs-Mods-a19/tree/main/Doughs-PunishingWeather-Effects-Light)** for A19
